title: The Cultural Blend of Singapore

One of the finest and the most renowned city in the country of Malaysia is Singapore. It is not only famous for being a global business centre but its clean roads and highly amiable people will make this destination even more ideal for people who want to go out and take a break from their lives. 

Apart from being the crux of the global business centre, Singapore is also the convergence between the cultures of different countries. If you are looking for a city that offers everything from luxury to budget options, then this is the place for you! Before you map this city, let us get you comfortable Singapore hotels where you can easily stay in and relax. 
The deals with the hotels 
Singapore hotels are known for their uber class and elite services. You will feel like a millionaire just by the services provided by these amazing hotels. Some of the best luxury hotels in the city include the Carlton Hotel, Peninsula Exelcior Hotel, Concord Hotel, Mandarin Hotel and some other big names when we talk about hotels. Since these hotels come from the topmost brand, you can easily get the best services of these hotels. 
They provide you with the option of splurging your money to extreme grandeur. They have everything that you can do to live a lavish life. They will provide you with sauna rooms, spa, massages, and outdoor pool to relax. There is no service that these top notch Singapore hotels can’t provide you. Moreover, the food they serve at their restaurants is delectable and extremely rich in flavors. 
Take a trip in the giant Ferris 
If you are not afraid to go for some adrenaline pumping action, then you should try the giant Ferric wheel that comes under the top attractions of the city. The best part about this Ferris wheel is that you get the most amazing and breathtaking sights of the whole city when you go up. With an accommodating capacity of 28 people, this is world’s largest Ferris wheel and if you want to know more about this, you will have to visit Marina Bay – the proud place to accommodate the largest Ferris wheel. 
Visit the famous Chinatown 
While there are many other things to do in Singapore, you should certainly not miss on this fun trip to Chinatown. As I mentioned above that the city has not just the culture of its own domain but houses and supports the culture of other countries too, you will find a very great Chinese hub in the city. Chinatown has the famous Tooth relic of Buddha Temple. This temple will provide you with all the sanity and serenity that you might be searching. Soul searching to its best happens in this place. The architecture is also mesmerizing. 
There is nothing about the beautiful city that you can’t enjoy. If you are keen enough, you will find many fun activities to do in this city. ...
